metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13035 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
The ISO IS-IS parser in tcpdump before 4.9.2 has a buffer over-read in print-isoclns.c:isis_print_id().

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-13035` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpdump - 4.9.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpdump package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.9.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
